sqlMap.select: SELECT G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD, G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ, G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, G.GIS_ASSETS_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, G.PRT_FCLTY_SE, G.PRT_FCLTY_NM, G.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD, G.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT, G.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, G.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, G.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD, G.PRT_FCLTY_AR, G.PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT, G.INFO, G.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT, G.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER, G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB, G.FCLTS_MNG_NO, M.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO) ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO_NM , M.MECH_FCLTS_SE , M.LOC , M.EQPMN_NM , M.EQPMN_NO , M.OPER_CMPNY , M.MFC_CMPNY , M.MFC_AMT , M.INSTL_YRMT , M.MFC_CHK_USR , M.OUT_REACH , M.BACK_REACH , M.REFLOAT_HT , M.PROCESS_ABLTY , M.DRIVE_WD , M.RAIL_WD , M.SELF_LOAD , M.WHEEL_WGHT , M.EQPMN_STNDRD , M.LINK_BRIDGE , M.RUBBER_FENDER , M.ELCTY_MTHD , M.CAPA_TON , M.CONTR_USR , M.CONTR_AMT , M.VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD , M.CLNG_SRC , M.HTNG_SRC , M.WATER_TANK , M.OIL_SAVE_TANK , M.SPICTANK_FMT , M.RM , M.MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = M.MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD) MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F M ON G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE 1=1 AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD=#gisPrtFcltyCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ=#gisPrtFcltySeq# AND G.PRT_FCLTY_SE=#gisPrtFcltySe#

SELECT F.ATCH_FILE_SEQ , F.ATCH_FILE_SJ , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , F.ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(F.ATCH_FILE_SE) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , TO_CHAR(F.ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G, FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F F WHERE G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_NO AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD=#gisPrtFcltyCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ=#gisPrtFcltySeq# AND G.PRT_FCLTY_SE=#gisPrtFcltySe# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ
